Description:
IN.CMG.181121.A-312044389
You have failed to ensure that LEV units 1, 2, 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 and 18 are maintained in an efficient state, efficient working order and in good repair. Specifically, you have failed to undertake the necessary remedial actions to ensure the effectiveness of these LEV units as per the statutory examination and inspection reports produced by the inspection body, which failed the above LEV units.

IN.CMG.181121.B-312044606
You have failed to ensure that a written plan is established for those parts of the premises containing asbestos, and that the measures which are to be taken for managing the risk are specified in the written plan.

IN.CMG.181121.C-312044687
You have failed to ensure that the tight fitting respiratory protective equipment (RPE) provided as a control measure for various substances hazardous to health (chemicals, dusts, fumes, etc) are subject to a thorough examination (and testing where appropriate) at suitable intervals.
